info.name: Health-Care-Sys
info.description: API endpoints for the restaurant application.

response.name: Register

exec: // Extract the token from the response body
var responseBody = pm.response.json();
var token = responseBody.token; // Adjust this according to your response structure
// Set the token as the collection-level variable
pm.collectionVariables.set('jwt_token', token);
// Extract the token from the response body
var responseBody = pm.response.json();
var token = responseBody.access_token; // Adjust this according to your response structure
// Set the token as the collection-level variable
pm.collectionVariables.set('jwt_token', token);
// Extract the token from the response body
var responseBody = pm.response.json();
var token = responseBody.access_token; // Adjust this according to your response structure
// Set the token as the collection-level variable
pm.collectionVariables.set('jwt_token', token);
// Extract the token from the response body
var responseBody = pm.response.json();
var token = responseBody.access_token; // Adjust this according to your response structure
// Set the token as the collection-level variable
pm.collectionVariables.set('jwt_token', token);
